channel.title: 'class' or 'interface' expected

item.title: 'class' or 'interface' expected
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

[quote=“D D 3, post:2, topic:150235”]Your missing a { or } somewhere in the file probably where you last edited

,
D D 3[/quote]

no he isn’t… that error just means theres a problem with the code, most likely needs to be added into another file or your server just can’t have it in it becouse its to big or somthing along those lines, happens with clients as well

item.title: 'class' or 'interface' expected
item.dc:creator: @11130 ²
item.description:
@11130 wrote:

Under server.java I have this code, it’s the last 3 lines of my file.

[code]}

public static int Foundz = 1;
public static int resetplayz;[/code]

I just added the:

public static int Foundz = 1; public static int resetplayz;

and when I went to compile it says:

[code]‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
public static int Foundz = 1;
^

‘class’ or ‘interface’ expected
public static int resetplayz;
^[/code]

Read full topic
